input.content: Translate from Miskito to English: Nanara witin iwras, witin baha wina nahara aula.

ideal: [ANSWER She isn't sitting now, she is coming from there to here.]

input.content: Answer in the affirmative making a sentence with the word given and wal: Tuktikam pulisa ki? (yul ba)

ideal: [ANSWER Au, witin yul ba wal pulisa.]

input.content: Translate from English to Miskito: We (exclusive) are going to bed.
